about_the_game:
In Notmads you play as a powerful mage who has mastered the art of taming and controlling a massive, walking giant beast. Explore a fantastical open world filled with magic and wonder as you journey on the back of your trusty companion.

As you travel, you can collect resources to build and customize your own home on the beast's back, creating a mobile fortress that you can take with you on your adventures. With a world filled with dangerous creatures, you'll need to use your mastery of magic to defend yourself and survive.

Invite friends to join your journey and share the experience of discovering this magical world together. With an open world designed for players to explore at their own pace, you can take on challenging quests, engage in battles against formidable foes, or simply relax and soak in the breathtaking scenery.

Control the beast!

Command your giant beast with precise control, effortlessly adjusting its speed and direction. Your beast is a unique entity with its own level, stats, gear, and abilities, allowing you to personalize and grow your companion as you explore the world.

Your home is everywhere!

Your beast has a platform on top and that is where your house is built.

Home sweet home

Craft the home of your dreams atop your beast, using a vast selection of building materials and components. Ensure its safety by constructing defensive structures such as turrets.

Watch your back!

Foes will attempt to attack your giant beast, so keep it in motion to stay out of harm's way. However, be aware that some areas are more dangerous, with more frequent attacks. Protect your home by installing automated turrets, powered by the energy generated from your beast's platform, to kill enemies.

Skills

Skills are powerful abilities that you can equip and switch at your discretion. Each skill has unique starting stats that are randomly generated, and they grow stronger as you use them. With limited slots to equip skills, you'll need to strategize when building your skill sets. Changing skills in the heat of battle can be challenging, so choose wisely between offensive, defensive, and passive skills. Some skills are exclusive to your beast, providing even more options for customization.

Alone or with friends!

Join forces with friends to delve into dangerous dungeons, defeat enemies, and protect your giant companion. Experience every aspect of the game together, including the main story, for a truly collaborative and memorable adventure.

Dungeons!

Delve into the depths of dungeons while your giant beast moves at your command, but don't forget to fortify your home-on-the-go with defensive structures like turrets. Use these to your advantage during battles, ensuring that you won't need to abandon the dungeon in the face of enemy attacks.

Loot!

Defeat foes and scavenge for treasure, with items ranging from common to rare. With a wide array of possible discoveries, such as swords, staves, armor, and more, each piece of loot will come with unique stats and rarity levels, adding endless excitement to your quests.

Story mode

While the main campaign will be a feature in the full release of the game, early access will offer a series of introductory missions to get you started. These basic missions will allow you to explore the world and get a feel for the game mechanics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Command a powerful beast as a mage in an open-world action RPG and build your customised fortress on its back. Defend it by learning and casting magic spells and team up with friends to experience this fantasy world together.
